website_summaries.verdict: Phiaton's BT 460 Bluetooth headphones offer powerful, bass-forward audio performance and an innovative control panel.
pros: Powerful audio performance with thunderous bass response
Good-looking, uncluttered design with some interesting control innovations
Detachable cable for passive playback includes an inline remote control
cons: Very sculpted sound signature not for everyone
Control panel and auto-play/pause function can get annoying

customer_reviews.title: Headband snapped, and wired connection stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality was decent, but build quality was not. The headband snapped in two with normal use and the wired connection stopped working. Also, being a person without hair...I did notice that not having any padding on the interior of the headband bothered me after an hour or two of use. Now have a pair of Bose .. .more expensive but so far a better buy.
customer_reviews.author: db

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality on the headband unconfortable to wear for long hours
customer_reviews.text: After approximately one year using it the headband cracked for no reason. And if you are asking your self, no it was never dropped to the floor. It has two layers on the head band, so it would still be usable if not for the load on top of my head of the heavy weight that give me head aches. It would be good if the head band was of better quality. And I am very careful with my things.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Amaral

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy headband.
customer_reviews.text: I've used many wired, and wireless Headphones before, Phiaton BT460 headphones are one of the best ones that I've owned. Phiaton BT460 ones are very comfortable to wear, however, after been using for a less than a year, band at the broke..didn't drop...just broke..not very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Rz

customer_reviews.title: I Love These Headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these primarily to make business calls. Everyone whom I call says I sound crystal clear...and there’s plenty of volume. Listening to music on these headphones is awesome! There’s a full range of sound. And, they feel super soft and comfortable to wear. The digital “finger sliding” volume control is very cool. I highly recommend these high quality headphones!
customer_reviews.author: Scott D. Persons

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Headphones!!!
customer_reviews.text: They sound great, very nice base, and they are very comfortable! I use these daily either connected to my laptop for video editing or just to listen to music with my iPhone. The touch and swipe work really well and the auto pause is really handy! I have had them for a few months now and I must say that the build quality is excellent, compares with the other expensive brands. I have taken them travelling and really like that they come with a good quality case. I would absolutely recommend that you pick up a pair of these!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pair of headphones!
customer_reviews.text: After getting my wife a pair, I had to get one of my own! As a music enthusiast I am always seeking the purest device to headset transfer and these headphones keep me content. They sound great, are comfortable to wear, and have unique technological features such as touch function on the right part of headphone and they turn on/off when you remove them from head.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: These headphones are better than beats
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are better than beats!!! Just my Opinion lol!!! No buttons, all you need is your finger!! Sound quality is amazing and its simply cool looking. I wish they had more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Dejax

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet elegant.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a huge audiophile like the other customers that had reviewed here but i appreciate a good quality sound from a good quality headphones. For a normal consumer, i think the design itself is sleek and elegant. Features of this headphones are quite useful. It has a nice weight to it. For a bluetooth headphones, sound quality is 10/10 for me. The noise cancelling is pretty good. Comfortable for long hearing hours. Satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Dirs MN

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and value
customer_reviews.text: Especially considering its price, this is an amazing product. Quality of material is fantastic, it comes with a very nice hardshell case, the headphone feels nice and sound quality is excellent. Highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a set of wireless headphone!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Kim

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line
customer_reviews.text: This headset is very well made. Feels like quality and the purple works well for unisex use. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, cool controls, great battery life, nice acoustics... Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Kern

customer_reviews.title: Great Bluetooth headphones at an even better price
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money Bluetooth connection works as it should; good battery life; easy to use and convenient touch functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Jacek

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a tech-savvy teenager who just loved them!
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: The controls are easy to use and the auto pause feature is really ...
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my wife. She loves them. The controls are easy to use and the auto pause feature is really cool. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Carneglia

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and love the touch function
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife and she absolutely loves them. Very comfortable and love the touch function!!!
customer_reviews.author: Salvador

customer_reviews.title: Nice and crisp
customer_reviews.text: At first hard to connect. They aren't the loudest things out there. These headphones have great sound, but the bass isn't that great. I am thinking of returning and getting something different.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lackluster performance!
customer_reviews.text: Sound is okay, and Bluetooth is below standard look elsewhere in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Teddy Edition
customer_reviews.text: Finally got my Teddy edition headphones!!! Fast shipping, very comfortable to wear and $50 off!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and functional
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm very much enjoying these headphones! They're my first bluetooth headphones, and I'm always surprised how well the device switching works, even though it's sometimes a bit of a hassle. These are pretty comfy when on my head and also fit nicely around my neck when not in use. EDIT: Physically fell apart after less than a year. Now that I've replaced them, I realize that the autoplay (how it senses when you put them on your head) was actually really annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Ramenhotep

customer_reviews.title: Great sound with lots of features
customer_reviews.text: I love the start stop feature. When you take the headphones off they immediately pause and begin playing again when you put them back on. The touch sensitive buttons work great! Good range. I can walk all around the house and still keep a sold BT signal. Case is very nice. Seems like they will last a very long time. Good battery life so far as well. Noise cancellation seems to work well, not like in ear headphones but great for over the ear.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mother. Set us was super easy! Came with cord to charge and a cable to plug directly into device. The sound quality is fantastic! Really cancels out noise around you. Like them so much, I'll be purchasing a pair for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Turner

customer_reviews.title: Everything you want in a Bluetooth headset!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! They are sound canceling, really comfortable and the music sounds great through them. They're super easy to connect to Bluetooth too.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret S.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: The hinges started getting stress cracks and eventually broke all together. I use for work and they are in hard case when not wearing. Will never by Phiaton products again.
customer_reviews.author: Burney

product_meta.title: Phiaton Bluetooth Wireless BT 460 Qualcomm Touch Interface, Premium Headphones with Mic, Smart Play and Pause, Black
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackThese expertly crafted Wireless bluetooth Headphones are engineered for maximum listening comfort and to provide unprecedented audio technology. With touch interface, One of a kind smart play-pause function, the BT 460 headphones will keep you moving and grooving until the moment you remove them. 

Make it a party with BT 460’s ShareMe technology, which allows multiple users of the BT 460 to share the same movie or music. 

Features: BLUETOOTH 4.0, SMART PLAY / PAUSE, TOUCH-INTERFACE, Everplay-X, BASS OPTIMIZER, ShareMe CONNECTION, WIRELESS MUSIC & CALLS, MULTIPOINT CONNNECTION, FOLD-AND-GO DESIGN. 

WHATS IN THE BOX: Hard Shell Carrying Case, USB Charging Cable, Optional Audio Cable with Mic, Quick Guide. Call Time: 20 hrs.; Music Play Time: 20 hrs.; Standby Time: 110 hrs.; Full Charge Time: 3 hrs.
feature_bullets: TOUCH-INTERFACE - Control with the tap or swipe of your finger- Play, pause, fast-forward, rewind, adjust volume, and accept calls using an interactive surface on the right side of your headphones.
SMART PLAY/PAUSE - Remove your headphones and your audio automatically pauses. Slip your headphones back on and the music continues. No need to reach out to your phone to pause or play the music
Everplay-X - Continue calling or listening to your music even if the battery runs out or your audio device is not Bluetooth compatible (via the included audio cable).

WARRANTY: Continue to enjoy your bluetooth wireless device long after the Amazon return period expires. All Phiaton bluetooth wireless products come with a One Year Warranty and we stand behind all of our products with a US based customer service.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars33 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
